column4: 1) running 11.04 on my t420; unity becomes unresponsive several times per day.  to solve; i go into a different tty; and do sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart ;; is there a better solution?  2) is there a way to get ubuntu to stop prompting me to enter my login password after i've logged in (something about a keyring)
well, this isn't a way to make it stop hanging, but pressing ctrl-alt-sysrq (printscreen key)-K kills the X server and deals with that a little bit faster :)
so its control + alt + printscreen  + the letter k ?
is this a known problem with laptops?
